unique_passive_1: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
unique_passive_2: Restore 1.25 mana every second. If you cannot gain mana, heal 0.55 health instead. Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Restore 1.25 mana every second. If you cannot gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead. Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

motd: Bugfix: Health regen now works correctly when mana is full.

unique_passive_2: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
Restore 0.75 mana every second, increased to 1.25 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 50% of this value instead.

unique_passive_1: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
unique_passive_2: Killing a minion restores 6 mana, if you can't gain mana, restore 3 health instead.
motd: Hotfix-bugfix: Bonus damage to minions is no longer lost on death. Passive mana regeneration has been properly removed.

unique_passive_1: Basic attacks deal 5 on-hit bonus physical damage to minions.

motd: Note: Patch notes claim that 'Mana restored per kill increased to 4 from 3', although no previous change to 3 is noted.

unique_passive_1: Restores 4 mana when you kill an enemy unit.
Restores 5 mana when you kill an enemy unit.
